subject: History
title: The Voynich Manuscript
description: A quick, practical guide to The Voynich Manuscript.

hook.text: A 600-year-old book is written in a language no one has ever identified, with illustrations of plants that don't exist.

buildup.text: The Voynich Manuscript contains 240 pages of text, botanical drawings, astronomical diagrams, and bathing women.

twist.text: Hundreds of codebreakers, including WWII veterans, have failed to crack it. AI analysis has also produced no consensus.

climax.text: Theories range from a lost natural language to an elaborate medieval hoax. The truth remains locked inside its pages.

punchline.text: The most studied unread book in history.

quiz.question: What makes the Voynich Manuscript's text unusual?
options: It's written backwards in mirror script
It uses a completely unidentified language with consistent structure
It alternates between Latin and Arabic scripts
